yaha jamAvadZa viciwra lagawA ho para hE Bawa mohaka , jisase kAPI mahilaeM unakI xukAna kI ora AkarRiwa ho rahI hEM .
isameM BavyawA , mAxakawA , swriyociwa rahasyamayawA , vyEkwawva Ora anukUlawA kA mAxaka miSraNa hE .
paraMparA kI waraha sAdZI ne BI hara yuga meM apanI svIkAryawA Ora AkarRaNa banAe raKA hE .
xuniyA ke xUsare pariXAnoM ke ulata sAdZI BaviRya meM behaxa saMBAvanAoM vAla awIwa kA pariXAna hE .
asala meM , mEM yaha aPavAha sunakara vahAM PaMcI WI ki vahAM paraxe ke pICe koI badZI , mahawvapUrNa GatanA Gata rahI hE .
apanI bexAga Cavi para garva karane vAle muyamaMwrI navIna patanAyaka ise bacAe raKane ke lie kuCa BI karane ko wEyAra xiKawe hEM .
isa pravqiwwa kI SuruAwa piCale kAMgresI SAsana meM jala saMsAXana Ora kqRi viBAgoM meM kaWiwa GotAlaM kI sIbIAi jAMca kI GoRaNA se hI .
Aja yaha jAMca ejeMsI Caha GotAlaM kI jAMca kara rahI hE .
patanAyaka ne A mAmalaM meM nyAyika jAMca ke BI AxeSa xie hEM , jabaki rAjya pulisa kI aparAXa SAKA nO gadZebadZiyoM kI padZewAla kara rahI hE .
isake alavA , maMwrimaMdZala se nikAle gae wIna kEbineta maMwriyoM ke KilaPa sawarkawA viBAga AXA xarjana mAmalaM kI jAMca kara rahA hE .
patanAyaka kahawe hEM , ' ' mEM jAMca ke AxeSa isalie xewA hUM kyoMki merI sarakAra kuCa CipAnA nahIM cAhawI . ' '
jAhira hE , patanAyaka kI svacCa Cavi unakI badZI pUMjI hE .
sAMsaxa saMsaxa sawra ke xOrAna saxana se CuttIM lie bagEra 60 xinoM se jyAxA gErahAjira nahIM raha sakawe .
agara ve CuttIM lie bagEra iwane laMbe samaya waka gErahAjira hoMge wo unakI saxasyawA Kawma kI jA sakawI hE .
lekina sAMsaxa ko ayogya harAnA hameSA iwanA AsAna nahIM
misAla ke wOra para mAkapA ke rAjyasaBA saxasya tI.esa.guruMga kA mAmala leM .
1987 Ora 1989 ke xOrAna guruMga lagAwAra 80 xinoM se BI jyAxA arase waka gErahAjira rahe .
lekina isase pahale ki ve koI javAba xewe , 13 janavarI 1989 ko rAjyasaBA sacivAlaya ko saMxeSa mila ki guruMga kI hawyA kara xI gaI hE .
ayogyawA praswAva pAriwa karane kI jagaha 21 ParavarI ko unheM SraxXAMjali xI gaI .
jyAxAwara sAMsaxa saxana se gAyaba rahane vAle apane sahayogiyoM ko CUta xene ke mAmale meM pICe nahIM rahawe .
masalana , koI BI sAMsaxa vewana yA BawwaeM meM vqxXi kA viroXa nahIM karawA Ora kisI sAMsaxa kI BarwsanA na karane ke mAmale meM saba ekamawa hEM .
hAlaMki jyAxAwara pArtI newA sAMsaxoM kI gErahAqrI para ciMwA jawAwe hEM para isa mAmale meM osa sujhava xene vAle Bawa kama hI hEM
jAhira hE , nirmAwA ' ' POYrena ' ' mAla ke prawi hamArI sanaka kA PAyaxA u A rahe hEM .
PilahAla , nyUyOYrka meM unakI praxarSanI cala rahI hE Ora agalI bostana meM hogI .
aba ve Pira suswA sakawI hEM .
ArakRaNa kI sanaka maXya praxeSa laka sevA Ayoga ke eka vijFApana para haMgAmA maca gayA .
warka yaha xiyA gayA WA ki Dera sAre ArakRiwa paxa KAlI hone kI vajaha se piCadZeM yA sAmAnya SreNI ke lie koI guMjAiSa nahIM hE .
maMwrI , sAMsaxa Ora pArtI kAryakarwA eka-xUsare se hErawa se pUCa rahe hEM-ye kyA hA ?
AKira maMxira muxxe kI iwanI MdZI prawikriyA kyoM
cunAva aBiyAna ke xOrAna BAjapA newAoM ne Ese ' saMkata ke samaya ' hiMxU rARtravAxa kA mahawva mawaxAwAoM ko samajhane meM koI kasara nahIM CodZI .
AKira galawI kyA ho rahI hE ?
unakA kAryakAla basa eka Ora naI jAwi-anya piCadZI jAwiyoM meM awyaMwa piCadZE- kA IjAxa karane ke lie hI yAxa kiyA jAegA .
unheM wo samajha jAnA cAhie WA ki jAwigawa samIkaraNoM ke Kela meM ve mAyAvawI Ora mulayama siMha ke sAmane nOsiKue hI hEM .
asala meM BAjapA meM isa samasyA kI SuruAwa SIrRa se hI howI hE .
praSAsana ke prawi praXAnamaMwrI kA ravEyA vEsA hI rahA hE jEsA unake pUrvavarwiyoM kA WA .
xillI meM Ese kaI sarakArI viBAga hEM jinheM kaI sAla pahale baMxa ho jAnA cAhie WA .
wo aba waka kyoM unakA vajUxa banA hA hE ?
Ese aXikAriyoM kI kamI nahIM jo karaxAwAoM kA pEsA vaha saba karane meM jAyA karawe hEM jo unheM nahIM karanA cAhie .
hama nahIM cAhawe ki ve Pilma samAroha Ayojiwa kareM yA leKakoM kA samelana bulaeM .
hameM sUcanA Ora prasAraNa maMwrAlaya aWavA presa sUcanA yUro yA KAxya prasaMskaraNa maMwrAlaya kI jarUrawa nahIM hE .
hameM sAmAjika waWA BOwika buniyAxI DAMce se sarokAra raKane vAle SEkwaSAlI maMwrAlayoM kI AvaSyakawA hE .
xonoM rARtrAXyakRa Ora SAsanAXyakRa ke rUpa meM eka-xUsare ko apanA rAjanEwika prawixvaMxvI hI mAnakara calawe hEM .
para KAMtI mAkrsavAxI janawA vimuikwa perAmunA ( jevIpI ) waWA kattaMra rARtravAxI siMhalIja heriteja isakA viroXa kara rahI hEM .
vikramasiMGe sarakAra ke lie yuxXa aba samajhxArI kA vikalpa nahIM raha gayA hE .
use virAsawa meM KAlI KajAnA mila hE waWA arWavyavasWA maMxI ke xOra meM hE .
uXara , elatItII BI 11 siwaMbara kI GatanA Ora AwaMkavAxa ke KilaPa viSvavyApI muhima kI pqR BUmi meM vArwA kI ora baDa hE .
lekina pOYpastArsa ko sabase badZa PAyaxA yaha hE ki usakI avaXAraNA mIdZiyA ke irxagirxa hI wEyAra kI gaI hE .
agara ladZekiyAM acCA aBinaya kareMgI wo unake pAsa Dera sArI saMBAvanAeM hoMgI . ' '
PilahAla , ye ' saMBAvanAeM ' pracAra-prasAra para nirBara hE .
yaha saba mAMga ke muwAbika gAne vAle bEMdZa se milane vAlI lakapriyawA ke lie hE .
Ora unake jaja BI eka se baDekara eka hEM-cOtA , gAyikA SuBA muxgala , malhowrA Ora mOYdZala-vIje suRamA reddIM .
isake bAxa sWiwi gaMBIra ho gaIH aMwima xOra meM PaMcane vAlaM se mulakAwa ke lie sAyara rikOYdZrsa ke mAlika Ora ' ' mEdZonA ko Kojane vAle ' ' semUra stIna Ora SoBA dZe A gaIM .
cayana kI isa prakriyA meM binA saMgIwa ke curA liyA Ora jAne jAM gAyA gayA .
muxgala bawAwI hEM , ' ' ImAnaxArI barawane ke lie viSeRakara svara parIkRaNa ke SurU meM hameM kuCa ekarUpawA kI jarUrawa WI . ' '
reddIM ne prawyASiyoM ke ' ' vyEkwawva Ora ravEe ' ' kI jAMca kI , lekina ve kahOwI hEM ki agara unhoMne eka bAra Ora curA liyA sunA wo ve gAyikA ko GUsA jadZe xeMgI .
svara guru cOtA Ora muxgala kA kahanA hE ki stAra gAyikAoM kI AvAja meM jajbAwa jAhira karane kI kRamawA , eka waraha kI ' ' muskAna ' ' Ora anoKApana honA cAhie .
isake alavA , yaha BI mahawvapUrNa WA ki samUha ke saxasyoM kA Apasa meM wAlamela ho , ve tIvI para sAmAnya xiKeM Ora Ora unake ceharoM para jajbA xiKe .
cOtA kA kahanA hE , ' ' kuCa ladZekiyoM ne na cune jAne para nArAjagI jAhira kI .
hameM usI waraha kA jajbA yA ravEyA cAhie .
EsI ladZekiyAM cAhie , jo nissaMkoca bAwa kareM , apane ko yogya mAneM . ' '
isa kAryakrama ke nirmAwA-nirxeSaka 28 varRIya xIpaka Xara kahawe hEM , ' ' BAvanA meM viviXawA xiKAnA muSkila howA hE . ' '
aMwima 20 ladZekiyoM ke svara praSikRaka roSana kA mAnanA hE ki jyAxAwara kI AvAja acCI WI para ve unheM unakI BaviRya kI prawibaxXawA ke bAre meM BarosA nahIM hE .
' ' unameM POrana hAsila karane kI uwkata icCA hE . ' '
mAlaBAdZE meM-xuniyA meM sabase aXika-mAmUlI Perabaxala kiyA gayA hE .
kirAyA baDakara nIwISa kumAra ne relave kI sEsadZI saMbaMXI gUDe samasyA ko sulajhane kI koSiSa kI hE .
yAwrI kirAe meM kamI ko asAmAnya rUpa se UMce mAlaBAdZE se pUrA kiyA jAwA rahA hE .
sadZeka parivahana se mAla DulaI meM vqxXi se relave kA rAjasva GatA Ora lagawa Karca baDe gayA .
isalie mAlagAdZiyoM kI gawi baDane , xruwagawi vAlI vAwAnukUliwa gAdZiyAM calane Ora mAla BAdZE kI xaroM ke 59 vargoM ko 32 karane jEse upAyoM se rela se mAla DulaI meM vqxXi hogI .
bajata meM niveSa ke vEkalpika swrowoM kI walaSa kA BI prayAsa hE.ye swrowa hoMge nijI kRewra , sArvajanika upakrama Ora rAjya sarakAreM .
relave kI viwwEiya sWiwi gadZebadZa rahI hE , vewana Karca baDe rahA hE Ora ka ora upAyoM ke aBAva meM lagawa Karca BI baDa hE .
lekina rAjanEwika majabUriyoM ke calawe isase aXika kuCa ho nahIM sakawA WA .
rAha meM hoMge rodZE maNipura meM okarama ibobI siMha ko sawwA sOMpI gaI .
yaxi kisI Pilma ke 5 priMta jArI hoM Ora vaha Pilma saBI jilaM meM Osawana xo hawe cala jAe wo munAPA waya hE . ' '
magara CawwEisagaDI PilmoM se aBI waka kisI siwAre kA uxaya nahIM hA hE .
piCale kuCa samaya se nirmAwA jyAxA osa kaxama u Ane lage hEM Ora ve aruNa govila , suXA caMxrana , varRA usagAMvakara Ora guddIM mAruwi sarIKe jAne-pahacAne kalakAroM ko apanI PilmoM meM lene lage
cUMki ye PilmeM muya wOra para CawwEisagaDI xarSakoM ko XyAna meM raKakara banawI hEM , so sWAnIya wawvoM ko pramuKawA xI jAwI hE .
baswara kI prAkqwika CatA , purAne rAjamahala Ora britiSa xOra ke gesta hAusa,gariyAbaMxa sarIKe kasbe Ora yahAM waka ki rAyapura ke muya bAjAra ko PilmAyA jA rahA hE .
ina PilmoM kI kahAnI CawwEisagaDI xarSakoM kI ruci ke anukUla howI hE .
so , ye PilmeM halkI-PulkI prema kahAniyoM , pArivArika kaWA Ora miWakoM para AXAriwa howI hEM .
varRoM pahale jaya saMwoRI mAM samUce CawwEisagaDe meM KAsI lakapriya hI WI Ora kuCa SaharoM meM wo karIba xo sAla waka calawI rahI .
isa bahasa ke alavA badZa savAla yaha hE ki maMwrAlaya nae saMSoXanoM ke bAre meM maCuAroM meM jAgarUkawA PElane ke lie kyA soca rahA hE .
so , SArka ko bacAne ke lie usake SikAra para pUrNa pAbaMxI hI ekamAwra kAragara warIkA hE . ' '
magara maMwrAlaya kA sUwra isase sahamawa nahIM hE , ' ' isase lagoM kI AjIvikA judZI hE Ora pAbaMxI lagane se hAlawa rAworAwa nahIM baxalawe . ' '
magara aba waka kisI aXikArI ko pramuKa baMxaragAhoM para BI yaha xeKane ke lie nahIM BejA gayA ki kOna-sI prajAwi kI maCalI pakadZI jA rahI hE Ora kOna-sI nahIM .
Ora na maMwrAlaya ne SArka kI saMyA kA anumAna lagAne ke lie koI samaya sImA waya kI hE.isake pICe Xana kI kamI kA ronA royA jA rahA hE .
hsEna kahawe hEM , ' ' pUrNa prawibaMXa kA AxeSa kAPI ka ora WA , magara naI aXisUcanA ko lagU karanA BI AsAna kAma nahIM hogA .
gujarAwa kA maryAxiwa saMxarBa sAPa jhlakawA hE .
Pira BI SaMkAeM raha gaIM .
bordZa ne kahA ki usane isa praswAva para 10 mArca kI apanI kAryakAriNI kI bE ka meM vicAra karane kA vAxA kiyA WA , para SaMkarAcArya ne saMvAxAwAoM ke sAmane jAkara use cOMkA xiyA .
SaMkarAcArya ke isa kaxama ke rAjanEwika arWa BI kama mahawvapUrNa nahIM hEM .
so , parixqSya wejI se baxala rahA hE .
mAno gAMXI Xarma kI veSaBURA meM leta Ae hEM .
kyA isa kapowa ke pAsa koI asaraxAra bAwa hE ?
unhoMne muskarAwe he kahA , pUCo .
Apa pUCane lagawe hEM , waBI ve tokawe hEM , ' ' aMgrejI meM nahIM . ' '
awIwa se kuCa Ora sabaka BI nahIM sIKe gae , masalana hiMsA para uwArU BIdZe se Ama nAgarikoM kI rakRA na kara pAne vAle pulisa aWavA praSAsanika aXikAriyoM ko sajA xilavAnA .
hameM Kuxa se savAla pUCane kI jarUrawa hE ki EsA kyoM hE .
Pira hameM praXAnamaMwrI vAjapeyI se BI yaha pUCanA hogA ki apanI hI pArtI xvArA pAle-pose gae hiMxU XarmAMXoM para ve niyaMwraNa kyoM nahIM raKa pA rahe hEM .
ve unako ayoXyA meM wuraMwa maMxira nirmANa rokane kA AxeSa kyoM nahIM xe pA rahe ?
yaxi una lagoM ko koI kAma karanA hI hE wo unheM gujarAwa Beja xIjie Ora una masjixoM kA punarnirmANa karavAie jinheM BIdZe ne wodZe girAyA hE .
xaMge meM ujadZE jIvana ko Pira se saMvArane meM maxaxa xekara unheM prAyaSciwa kA mOkA xIjie .
vElyU risarca ke nixeSaka XIreMxra kumAra kahawe hEM , ' ' sarakAra ne kAnUna ke jarie xUraxarSiwA xiKAI hE . ' '
una karodZeM xeSavAsiyoM ke lie , jo 1990-92 ke uWala-puWala Bare xOra meM hoSa saMBAla cuke We , piCala xaSaka na AwA wo SAyaxa acCA howA .
eka bAra Pira arWavyavasWA dZAvAMdZola hone lagI hE .
Ora mAhOla meM Pira asahAyawA Ora nirASA Bara gaI hE .
vEse , koq 12 sAla pahale ke parixqSya se Aja kI sWiwi meM eka osa Parka hE .
merA praSikRaNa aBI pUrA nahIM hA hE magara aba ise jalYI CodZenA BI nahIM cAhawA .
Pira , selvama ne mujhmeM isa mqwaprAya kala ke saMrakRaNa kI preraNA BI jagA xI hE . ' '
isa preraNA ke lie misAla BI jo mOjUxa hEM .
selvama ko isa yuxXakala ke saMvarxXana ke lie rAjya sarakAra se mAwra 500 ru.kA anuxAna milawA hE.magara unakI AsWA kaBI nahIM dZigI .
unake lie wo umra kI koI bAXA nahIM hE .
aba yaha bAwa sAPa howI jA rahI hE ki hAla ke xaMge goXarA meM rAmasevakoM ko jalae jAne kI POrI prawikriyA mAwra nahIM We .
isa savAla para BI jamakara bahasabAjI ho rahI hE ki praSAsana AKira isa KUna-KarAbe ko kyoM nahIM roka pAyA ?
kyA yaha isalie hA kyoMki wAjA-wAjA sekulara Cavi XAraNa karane vAlI BAjapA ko kattaMrapaMWiyoM ke KilaPa sawI se peSa Ane para apanI Cavi KarAba hone kA aMxeSA WA ?
yA yaha SuxXa rUpa se praSAsanika nAkAmI WI ?
rAjya ke maxarasoM meM xevabaMxa , isakI miSanarI ikAI wabalIgI jamAwa Ora ahala-e-haxIsa sabase wAkawavara hEM .
bawAwe hEM ki alI kI hI waraha kaSmIra Ora anyawra jehAxa meM lage wamAma AwaMkavAxI inhIM maxarasoM se ' wAlIma ' lewe rahe hEM .
BAvanagara kA maxarasA isa Aropa ko KArija karawA hE .
eka xuKI Ora pareSAna rARtrIya koca telIvijana kEmaroM ke sAmane apanI baraKAswagI kI GoRaNA karawe he pUCa rahA WA , ' ' yahAM muya koca kOna hE ? ' '
lekina yaha gujarI hI Ora yAxoM meM basI bAwa hE .
2 mArca , 2002 , jisa xina dZi ' sUjA ko baraKAswa kiyA gayA , mOjUxA hakIkawa hE .
dZi ' sUjA ne kuAlalaMpura meM apane sAmane bE e pawrakAroM se pUCA , ' ' Apa hI laga bawAie , kyA yahI warIkA hE ?
mujhse beMca para bE ne , sahAyawA karane , salaha xene Ora saMvAxaxAwA samelana meM SAmila hone kI Ese umIxa kI jA rahI hE jEse kuCa hA hI na ho .
yahAM muya koca kOna hE ? ' '
kisI ke pAsa koI javAba nahIM WA .
dZi ' sUjA muMbaI leta gae Ora unakI jagaha unake sahAyaka sI.Yara.kumAra ne le lI .
vaha Bramiwa Ora BArawIya-yUropIya SEliyoM kI saMkara SElI meM Kela rahA WA .
isake alavA , KiladZiyoM ke anoKe warIke se cayana kI vajaha se jApAna ke sAWa dZrOY Ora maleSiyA se 2-3 se hAra kI nObawa A gaI .
viSva kapa kI riporta xe rahe pUrva BArawIya KiladZI xaMga We .
pUrva stAra POYravardZa jagabIra siMha ne kahA , ' ' mujho vAkaI nahIM samajha A rahA hE ki tIma kEse Kela rahI hE .
koq pAraMparika SElI se nahIM KelanA cAhawA hE wo qka hE .
lekina yaha na wo iXara kI na hI uXara kI SElI hE . ' '
kumAra aba kahawe hEM ki tIma kI nAkAmiyAM raNanIwika WIM .
' ' hama pahale ke mEcoM meM galawa raNanIwi apanA rahe We .
sarkala meM ( XanarAja ) pillO ko akele CodZenA cAhie Ora jugarAja ( siMha ) Pula bEka hEM lihAjA unheM usI jagaha KilayA jAnA cAhie .
mEM EsA hI karane kI koSiSa kara rahA hUEYMMM . ' '
kuCa lagoM kI ASaMkA ke muwAbika kaMvalaprIwa siMha jEse yuvA KiladZI viSva kapa jEsI prawisparXA ke lie wEyAra nahIM We .
Ora jhtapata sabastItyUta lae jAne kI vajaha se tIma sWira nahIM ho pAI .
jaba BArawIya iMglOMdZa se cOWA mEca hAre wo unameM asaMwoRa pExA ho gayA .
tIma ke kuCa saxasyoM ne kapwAna balajIwa siMha DillaM Ora unake BAI xalajIwa para Kuxa gola karane kA prayAsa karane kA Aropa lagAyA .
dZi ' sUjA ke niyamoM ke muwAbika Sivira meM SAmila na hone vAle KiladZI kA cayana uciwa nahIM howA .
stAra POYravardZa pillO eka Sivira meM SAmila nahIM ho pAe Ora isa waraha ve viSva kapa kvAliPAyara mEcoM se bAhara ho gae .
cecaka se pIdZiwa sEnI varldZa kapa Sivira meM SAmila nahIM ho sake para tIma meM SAmila kara lie gae .
gagana kI jagaha xalajIwa ko isa AXAra para cuna liyA gayA kyoMki varldZa kapa se pahale gagana acCe POYrma meM nahIM We .
maXya praxeSa ke ina xo estrEkta kalakAroM kI kala praxarSanI xillI ke Arta tudZe gElarI meM lagAI gaI hE .
sabase laMbA ropave yaha AMXra praxeSa ke wirupawi meM BagavAna veMkateSvara ke sabase saMpanna hiMxU maMxira waka PaMcane kA aXika KUbasUrawa , AsAna Ora weja mArga hogA .
xuniyA Bara meM havAI ropave banAne meM agraNI dZOYpala mera pahAdZI para sWiwa isa maMxira ke lie ropave banAegA .
jUna 2003 meM pUrA hone ke bAxa yaha eSiyA Ora saMBavawaH xuniyA kA sabase badZa ropave hogA.isakI laMbAI 6.1 kimI hogI .
isa ropave kI yojanA 30 sAla pahale bana gaI WI para aBI waka ise maMjUrI nahIM xI gaI WI .
isase hara GaMte 1,000 laga yAwrA kara sakeMge .
yaha maMxira meM mahawvapUrNa xinoM meM PaMcane vAle eka laKa wIrWayAwriyoM ke lie varaxAna sAbiwa ho sakawA hE .
muhEyA karAyAH BArawa saMcAra nigama ne Sulka rahiwa jana suviXA Pona naMbara .
niyukwaH arcanA suMxara-liMgama sIbIAi kI pahalI mahila saMyukwa nixeSaka .
niXanaH 61 varRIya iwihAsakAra yaxuveMxra sahAya kA jayapura meM .
dZetOYla Ora kaI anya upaBokwA sAmagriyoM kI nirmAwA rekita beMkAijara ple.ne 13 mArca ko PEsala kiyA ki aba vaha BArawIya Seyara bAjAra ko alavixA kaha xegI .
usane apanI sahAyaka BArawIya kaMpanI ke SeyaraXArakoM se apane Seyara KarIxane kI peSakaSa kI , wAki vaha Seyara bAjAra kI sUcI se bAhara ho jAe .
Seyara bAjAra se hatane kI isa hodZe se kaI savAla pExA howe hEM- kaI BarARtrIya kaMpaniyoM kI acAnaka vixAI se BArawIya Seyara bAjAroM para kyA asara padZEgA ?
BArawIya kaMpanI jagawa kI kyA prawikriyA hogI ?

aXikAMSa BArawa meM , xaMda ke Baya ke kAraNa logoM se xUsaroM ke aXikAroM kA Axara karAyA jAwA
rAjA kA yaha karwavya WA ki vaha viXi ko BaMga karane vAloM ko xaMda xe Ora EsI parisWiwiyAM suniSciwa kare jinameM samAja kA kAmakAja sucArU rUpa se calawA rahe .
prawyeka vyakwi ko nyAya pAne kA aXikAra WA Ora use nyAya praxAna karane kA kArya rAjya kA WA .
rAjA SakwiSAlI WA Ora rAjya kA prawIka BI WA kiMwu use viXi nirmANa kA aXikAra nahIM WA .

2 . SreNI ( nigama ) ; jisa prakAra vaNika SreNiyoM meM mAXyasWam vyavasWA WI vEse hI ye nyAyAlaya BI eka hI Silpa , vyavasAya aWavA vyApAra meM

arWaxaMda Ora SArIrika xaMda kA nirNaya kevala rAjA hI kara sakawA WA .
loka nyAyAlaya paMcAyawaxAroM se banawe We .
inheM hiMsA ke prayoga se yukwa aparAXoM ke vicAraNa ko CodZakara SeRa saBI prakAra ke sivila Ora xAMdika mAmaloM ko nipatAne kA aXikAra WA .
Ese mAmale rAjA ke samakRa hI le jAne howe We- Ese xaMdAxeSoM kA anumoxana karane Ora xaMda niRpAxiwa karane kA AxeSa xene kA aXikAra kevala rAjA ko hI WA .

apane rAjya ke uccawama nyAyAlaya ke rUpa meM kArya karane kA rAjA ko viSeRAXikAra sarvamAnya WA .
yA&valkya ne yaha liKA hE ki rAjA kisI BI xoRapUrNa nirNaya kA punarvilokana karake use apAswa kara sakawA hE , Bale hI vaha nirNaya svayaM rAjA ne hI xiyA ho .
rAjA , prAdavivAka ( muKya nyAyAXISa ) Ora saBya ( nyAyAXISa ) isa nyAyAlaya ke nyAyika aXikArI howe We .
gaNaka ( leKAkAra ) , leKaka ( lipika ) Ora svapuruRa ( kurka amIna ) nyAyAlaya ke gEra nyAyika aXikArI howe We .
1 . nyAyAXISa nirxayI nahIM honA cAhie , usakA svaBAva mqxu ho , vaha xayAlu , cawura Ora UrjAvAna ho
ina niyukwiyoM ke lie SUxroM kI siPAriSa kaBI nahIM kI jAwI WI kyoMki usa kAla ke pariveSa meM SUxroM se XarmagranWoM kA aXyayana karane kI apekRA nahIM WI .
saBI XarmaSAswroM Ora smqwiyoM kI spaRta AjFA hE ki nyAya karanA nyAyAXISoM kA parama Xarma hE .
gOwama ne yaha aXikaWiwa kiyA hE ki nyAya karawe samaya rAjA wIna swrowoM se apanI viXi kI vyuwpawwi kare :

rAjanIwi se sIXA saMbaMXa na hone waka suBARa ne pIroM-PakIroM se mela-jola jArI raKA Ora sZvayaM ko waraha waraha ke sAmAjika kAryoM meM KapAye raKA .

awa : eva isa bAwa kI saMBAvanA prawIwa howI hE ki nyAyapAlikA kA kuCa haxa waka vikeMxrIkaraNa WA .

akabara ke SAsana kAla se pahale nyAyika prakriyA para BI pAraMparika muslima viXi lAgU kI jAwI WI .

abU hanIPA kA yahI kahanA hE .

nEwika niyamoM para amala karAne kA eka rocaka mAmalA hE .

sana 1511 meM viliyama PiMca liKawA hE :

wricurI meM kAMgresa kA aXiveSana SurU hone ke pahale hI kAMgresa varkiMga kametI ke 22 saxasZyoM meM se 15 meMbaroM ne 22 ParavarI , 1935 ko apane isZwIPe xe xiye .

ho sakawA hE ki jaba waka loga soceM , usake pahale hI koI rAsZwA apane Apa nikala Aye .
PilahAla mere lie yahI TIka rahegA ki mEM una pravQwwiyoM kA leKA-joKa raKUM , jo hiMxusZwAna meM piCale wIna barasoM meM uBara AyI hEM . . ..

Ese saMgIna mOkoM para jaba hameM pUrI samZmiliwa SakZwi kI jarUrawa hE , waba saMsZWA meM viBAjana yA isa waraha kI koI xUsarI cIja hameM kamajora Ora nAkArA banA xegI .
yaha bAwa sAXaraNa , para sIXe sIXe Bale hI lAgU nahIM ho , lekina jo loga isa DaMga se socawe hEM , unake jariye janasAXAraNa para isakA asara jarUra padZawA hE .
isa waraha hama isa nawIje para pahuMcawe hEM ki kAMgresa ko kAragara DaMga se calAne ke lie AXunikawAvAxI logoM ke varga kA BI pUrA pUrA sahayoga jarUrI hE .

jo loga isake makasaxa Ora isake warIkoM meM yakIna karawe hEM , unake lie isake xaravAje Kule hEM .
mEM nahIM mAnawA ki hiMxusZwAna meM jo badZI badZI pariyojanAeM SurU karane kI soca raKI hEM , ve Ama janawA ke sahayoga ke binA vAsZwavika rUpa se saPala ho sakawI hEM .

4 Xarma , saMsaq_qwi Ora sAMpraxAyika rAjanIiwa
mEMne akZsara yaha mahasUsa ZkiyA hE ki yaha wo aMXaviSZvAsa Ora prawigAmI vicAroM , rUDiyoM Ora kattarawA , mUDZa viSZvAsa , SoRaNa Ora sZvArWa sAXane kI cIja hE .
magara mEM jAnawA hUM ki isameM kuCa Ora BI hE , kuCa EsI cIja hE jo mAnava prANiyoM ke xilo meM gaharA AkarRaNa pExA karawI hE .
nahIM wo isakA eka jabaraxasZwa wAkawa bananA Ora aba BI Ese hI bane rahanA Ora xuKoM ke mAre anaginawa logoM ko suKa Ora SAMwi xenA kEsA mumakina WA ?
saMgaTiwa Xarma pahale cAhe jEsA BI rahA ho , lekina Aja wo yaha KAlI eka Kola hI raha gayA hE , jisake aMxara koI BI asalI cIja nahIM hE .
isa SabZxa ko sunane yA paDZane para SAyaxa hI kinZhIM xo vZyakZwiyoM ke mana meM eka jEse vicAra yA biMba Awe hoM .
yoM wo ye SabZxa BI kAPI asZpaRZta hEM , lekina ' Xarma ' kI wulanA meM inake arWa wo ZsImiwa hEM .
wo Xarma kZyA hE ( yahAM isa SabZxa se hone vAlI hAni ke bAvajUxa isI kA prayoga kiyA jA rahA hE ) ?
aba yaha bahasa ho sakawI hE ki yaha xiSA kOna-sI hE .
isameM koI Saka nahIM ki yaha AMwarika vikAsa bAharI vAwAvaraNa para jabaraxasZwa asara dAlawA hE .
lekina yaha BI sZpaRZta hE ki bAharI vAwAvaraNa AMwarika vikAsa para jabaraxasZwa asara dAlawA hE .
yaha eka Brama hE , jisase hama loga apane ko wasalZlI xewe hEM Ora apanI hInawA kI BAvanA se Upara uTane kI koSiSa karawe hEM .
ho sakawA hE ki kuCa ikaq_rkexukaq_ke loga apanI parisaq_WiwiyoM Ora vAwAvaraNa se Upara uTa jAyeM Ora awaq_yaXika Awaq_mika unaq_nawi kare .
lekina badZe badZe vargoM Ora rARZtroM ke lie AMwarika vikAsa hone ke pahale kuCa haxa waka bAharI vikAsa kA honA jarUrI hE .
jo varga paxaxaliwa Ora SoRiwa howA hEM , vaha kaBI BI AwZmika unZnawi nahIM kara sakawA .
jo mulZka siyAsI Ora ArWika xqRZti se kisI xUsare mulZka kA gulAma howA hE , jo baMXanoM se baMXA Ora cAroM waraPa se GirA howA hE , jo SoRiwa howA hE vaha kaBI BI AwZmika unZnawi nahIM kara sakawA .
isa waraha AwZmika unZnawi ke lie BI bAhya sZvawaMwrawA Ora samuciwa vAwAvaraNa kA honA jarUrI howA hE .
gAMXI jI ne kahIM liKA hE , " koI BI vZyakZwi Xarma ke binA nahIM raha sakawA .
kuCa Ese loga hEM , jo apane warka ke GamaMda meM rahawe hEM ki hamArA Xarma se koI saMbaMXa nahIM hE .
magara yaha wo EsI bAwa huI jEse koI AxamI sAMsa lewA ho , lekina yaha kahawA ho ki mere nAka nahIM hE . "
jAhira hE ki ve isakA isZwemAla eka Ese arWa meM kara rahe hEM , jo Xarma kI AlocanA karane vAloM ke arWa se juxA hE .
lekina isakA yaha mawalaba nahIM ki gujare jamAne kI una cIjoM se hama apanA nAwA wodZa xeM yA unako bilZkula BUla jAyeM , jo gujare jamAne meM wAkawa Ora jiMxagI xewI WIM .
waraha waraha ke XarmoM ne mAnavawA kI warakZkI meM BArI maxaxa kI hE .
ye kamiyAM AmawOra para xarSana meM nahIM milawIM Ora usane Koja Ora vicAra karane kI pravqwwi ko baDZAvA xiyA
vijFAna ne aMwima lakRZyoM para XZyAna nahIM xiyA Ora sirPa asaliyawa para hI gOra kiyA .
jiMxagI Ora prakqwi ko hama jiwanA jZyAxA samaJawe jAwe hEM , uwanA hI xEvI SakZwiyoM para hama kama XZyAna xene lagawe hEM .
jo kuCa hama samaJa sakawe hEM Ora jo kuCa hama niyaMwriwa kara sakawe hEM , vaha rahasZya nahIM raha jAwA .
XIre XIre ina para se unakA niyaMwraNa hata gayA Ora inakA vEjFAnika aXZyayana hone laga gayA .
aba BI AKirI rahasZya iMsAna ke ximAga kI pahuMca se bAhara hE Ora SAyaxa yaha isI waraha Age BI rahegA .
jiMxagI ke bahuwa-se rahasZyoM kA hala ho sakawA hE Ora usakI jarUrawa BI hE , lekina AKirI rahasZya jAnane kI jixa karanA aBI na wo jarUrI hE Ora na yaha uciwa hI hE .
isalie hameM vEjFAnika ravEye Ora xqRZtikoNa ko xarSana se jodZakara Ora jo kuCa BI usake pare hE , usake prawi SraxXA kA BAva raKakara jiMxagI kA sAmanA karanA cAhie .
bAharI GatanAoM Ora unake nawIjoM kA hama para jabaraxasZwa asara howA hE , lekina hamAre ximAga para sabase badZe XakZke wo aMxarUnI dara yA xvaMxva hone se lagawe hEM .
vijFAna paSZcima kI xuniyA para hAvI ho gayA hE Ora vahAM saBI isake guna gAwe hEM , lekina vahAM loga ZPira BI vEjFAnika sZvaBAva ke asalI sZvarUpa ko nahIM apanA sake hEM .
mEM samaJawA hUM ki hamAre pAsa isa pAbaMxI ke bAre meM socane kA vakZwa nahIM hE kZyoMki hama apane KAna-pAna Ora xUsarI rasZma-rIwiyoM meM behawara ulaJe hue hEM .
prakqwi ne hamase isakA baxalA le liyA hE .
hamArI AsZWAeM purAnI imArawa kA KaMdahara bana aba sAPa-suWarI nahIM raha gayI hEM Ora vaha hara waraha kI gaMxagI , niSAna Ora lakIroM se Kuraca uTI hEM .
Aja hamArI aMwarAwZmA para una logoM kA kabZjA hE , jo waMga najara hEM , kattara hEM Ora jo KoKalI rIwi-rasZma ke alAvA kuCa Ora nahIM jAnawe .
gomate ne kahA ki Ese aXZyApaka se jZyAxA KawaranAka bAwa Ora kZyA ho sakawI hE , jo sirPa uwanA hI jAnawA hE ki jiwanA ki vixyArWiyoM se umZmIxa kI jA sakawI hE .
kula milAkara hameM una wamAma burAiyoM se CutakArA pAnA hE , jo hamameM A gayI hEM Ora hamArI sArI vZyavasZWA meM jahara Bara xenA cAhawI hEM .

lekina muJe lagawA hE Zki hama ZPira uTeMge Ora uTa sakawe hEM .
Aja hiMxU Xarma ko majabUwa karane Ora vaha jisa waraha amala meM hE , use SuxXa karane ke bAre meM jora-Sora se bAweM kI jA rahI

vaha yaha ki Apasa meM dara Ora Saka baDZegA Ora xUsarI kOmoM meM BI isI waraha ke jajZbAwa pExA hoMge .
AhisZwA AhisZwA hiMxusZwAna POjI kEMpoM meM baMta jAyegA Ora hara iMsAna apane BAI ke KilAPa haWiyAra uTA legA .

yaha siPAriSa mAna lI gayI Ora bahuwa se loga berahamI se nikAla bAhara kiye gaye .
" kZyA hamAre vijayI puraKoM ne IsAI Xarma ko sZpena se uKAdZa PeMkane kI koSiSa kI , jabaki unameM EsA karane kI wAkawa WI ?

xonoM ora se sAMpraxAyika rAjanIwijFoM ko , jo ZhameSA kOMsiloM meM sItoM kI wAxAxa ke bAre meM bahasa kiyA karawe We , sarakAra kI meharabAnI ZkI ZPikra rahawI WI kZyoMki isI meM unakA PAyaxA WA .
yaha wo maXZyavarga ke paDZa-liKe logoM ke lie badZI badZI nOkarI pAne kI ladZAI WI .

AgA KAM Ora unake xala ke logoM kA lArda lAyada ke sAWa GaniRZTa saMbaMXa eka badZI hI asAXAraNa bAwa WI .
ye loga eka kaxama Age baDZa gaye Ora inZhoMne rAuMda tebula kAMPreMsa meM yUropIya esosieSana ke prawiniXiyoM waka se samaJOwA kara liyA .
yaha badZe hI xuHKa Ora nirASA kI bAwa WI kZyoMki esosieSana hiMxusZwAna kI AjAxI kA sabase kattara Ora jabaraxasZwa viroXI rahA hE Ora aba BI hE .
hiMxU mahAsaBA ke prawiniXiyoM ne isakA javAba isa waraha xiyA ki unZhoMne KAsa kara paMjAba ke lie logoM para hara waraha kI roka lagAne kI mAMga kI , jo aMgrejoM ke haka meM We .
musalamAno ke bolane ke DaMga meM kama se kama kuCa saMjIxagI wo WI , lekina hiMxU sAMpraxAyikoM ke pAsa wo yaha BI nahIM WI .
xonoM hI waraPa ArWika savAloM para vicAra karane ke bajAya unako xabAne Ora tAlane kI koSiSa kI jAwI hE .
piCale xinoM kuCa musalamAna sAMpraxAyika newAoM ke vZyAKZyAnoM Ora vakZwavZyoM meM eka majexAra wabZxIlI huI hE .
hiMxusZwAna meM musZlima rARZtra-eka rARZtra ke BIwara xUsarA rARZtra Ora vaha BI saMgaTiwa nahIM , balZki biKarA huA Ora aniSZciwa .
siyAsI najariye se xeKA jAye wo yaha socanA hI vAhiyAwa hE Ora ArWika xqRZti se SeKacilZlI jEsA hE ; yaha XZyAna xene lAyaka hI nahIM hE .
lekina Pira BI inake pICe jo manovqwwi CipI hE , isake jariye WodZA-bahuwa use samaJane meM maxaxa milawI hE .
yaha usa xeSewara BAvanA kI SuruAwa WI , jo hAla meM pUraba ke kuCa mulZkoM ke lie hOvA bana gayI WI .

1 . mEM kOna-sI kiwAbeM paDZawA hUM ?

kAMgresa , jo sZvarAja hAsila karane jA rahI hE , Aja wAkawavara hE kZyoMki garIbI ne , paxaxaliwoM ne Ora kamajora se kamajora wabake ke logoM ne use apanA sahArA xiyA hE .
paSaq_cima meM samAjavAxa Ora pUraba ke mulaq_koM meM Ora xUsare gulAma mulaq_koM meM qsa rARaq_trIyawA kA janaq_ma huA , vaha PAsijaq_ma Ora sAmrAjaq_yavAxa ke isa gaTabaMXana kI KilAPawa kI .
isa waraha Aja hama xuniyA ko xo badZI jamAwoM meM baMtA huA xeKawe hEM-eka jamAwa sAmrAjZyavAxiyoM Ora PAsisZtoM kI hE Ora xUsarI jamAwa samAjavAxI Ora rARZtravAxiyoM kI hE .
wo hama hEM kahAM-hama , jo hiMxusZwAna kI AjAxI ke lie mehanawa maSakZkawa kara rahe hEM .

isalie ZPilIsZwAna ke masale para mEM jarA kuCa waPasIla se kahanA cAhawA hUM .

sZpena meM kZyA huA ?
kuCa mahIne hue vahAM sAmAnZya lokawAMwrika cunAva hue Ora PalasZvarUpa vahAM eka lokapriya redikala pArtI-saMyukZwa lokapriya morcA-sawwA meM AyI .
vaha koI sAmZyavAxI yA koI samAjavAxI sarakAra nahIM WI .
usameM eka BI sAmZyavAxI yA samAjavAxI nahIM WA .

isa jabaraxasZwa muxxe para hama britena ke SAsaka varga Ora vahAM kI sarakAra ko PAsisZtavAxa kI waraPaxArI karawe xeKa rahe hEM .
hama xeKawe hEM ki lokawaMwra kI dIMga mArane vAlA sAmrAjZyavAxI britena EsI wAkawoM ke sAWa hamaxarxa hE , jo sZpena meM lokawaMwra kI hawZyA karane kI koSiSa meM lage hue hEM .
yaha yAxa raKanA cAhie ki sZpena meM sAmZyavAxa yA samAjavAxa Ora PAsijZma ke bIca saMGarRa nahIM ho rahA hE , balZki yaha saMGarRa loZkawaMwra Ora krUra POjI PAsijZma ke bIca ho rahA hE .

Aja sArI xuniyA meM ve pragawi kI wAkawoM kA viroXa kara rahe hEM-yUropa meM sAmAjika pragawi kA Ora hiMxusZwAna Ora xUsare gulAma mulZkoM meM rAjanIwika pragawi waka kA .

lekina isa ApasI saMGarRa ke bAvajUxa vaha AjAxI kI sAmAjika cAhawa Ora rAjanEwika sZvawaMwrawA ke lie rARZtrIya saMgrAma ke KilAPa eka-xUsare ke bAre meM hamaxarxI raKawe hEM .
Ora isa waraha hiMxusZwAna apanI AjAxI ke lie jo ladZAI ladZa rahA hE , vaha sAmrAjZyavAxa Ora PAsijZma ke KilAPa xuniyA ke saMGarRa kA eka hisZsA hE .
unZhoMne vahAM rahakara xosZwa ko XoKA xene kA muSZkila Ora xAMvapeMca kA Kela xeKA .

agara EsA howA , waba yaha morcA jarmanI Ora italI ke KilAPa eka jabaraxasZwa morcA howA ( agara italI jarmanI se mila jAwA , jo kisI BI waraha waya nahIM WA .

isakA mawalaba soviyawa yUniyana ko majabUwa banAnA WA Ora sArI xuniyA meM janawA kI wAkawa ko KulI CUta xenA WA .

usakI bETaka BI nahIM bulAyI gayI .

Apa ke lie .

vE&Anika upakaraNa

iwihAsa
prAkqwika iwihAsa saMgrahAlaya kisa prakAra iwane bafe waWA mahawvapUrNa saMkalana kara pAyA hE ?
/MgrahAlaya meM kOna kArya karawA hE ?
ve isI kArya ko karane ke lie kyoM cunawe hEM ?
unhoMne apanA vEjFAnika vyavasAya kEse SurU kiyA ?
saMgrahaNa , mAnava prakqwi kA eka hissA hE waWA yaha iwihAsa ke mAXyama se saMskqwiyoM ke saMparka meM huA hE .
prAkqwika iwihAsa saMgrahAlaya meM raKe hue saMgraha hewu samayoparAnwa unakI upayogiwA ke bAre meM vicAra baxala gae hEM .
prawyeka namUnA dAtA waWA prAkqwika vaswu kA saMyoga hE waWA anya namUnoM se isakI samAnawA ke lie saMxarBa sahiwa ise saMgraha meM raKA gayA hE .

hama prawivarRa saMgraha meM hajAroM namUne jodZakara joraxAra DaMga se ise vikasiwa kara rahe hEM .
isakA raKa-raKAva howA hE waWA SakwiSAlI jFAna ke saMsAXana ke rUpa meM inakA prayoga baDZawA hE .
viSvavyApI mahawva .
uhAM mOjUxa jFAna kA upayoga viSvaBara ke SoXakarwwAoM xvArA kiyA jAwA hE .
isake baxale meM , yaha nayA jFAna sqjiwa karawA hE waWA vAswava meM , nayA saMgraha wEyAra howA hE .
nayA dIenae saMgraha
uxAharaNa ke lie , hamane dIenae saMgraha karanA , jAnavara waWA pOXe ke tiSyU ke tukafo ko jamAnA , SurU kara xiyA hE .

inameM SAmila hEM :
Ese namUnoM ke praxarSana Ora aXyayana ke lie , hamArI saMrakRaNa prayogaSAlA inakI hU-ba-hU prawikqwi banAne meM sakRama hE .
hamArA swanapAyI jIvoM kA saMgrahapAla kisI BI namUne ko usake sirPa eka bAla se BI pahacAna sakawA hE .

namUnoM ke bAre meM viSeRa kyA hE ?
kisI BI namUne ko pahacAnane kA sarvowwama warIkA , isakI xUsare namUnoM se wulanA karanA hE .
isI vajaha se yaha saMgraha kisI prajAwi vargIkaraNa viSeRajFa ke lie kisI jIva kI pahacAna karane kA sabase behawara sAXana hE .
hama alaga-alaga jIvoM ko alaga-alaga warIke se pahacAnawe hEM .
prawyeka namUne ke bAre meM pUrI jAnakArI upalabXa nahIM howI .
jaba SoXakarwwA yahAM se jAwe hE wo unake xvArA Cofe gae namUne unake SoXa , leKana Ora vicAroM kA muKya saMxarBa bana jAwe hEM .
namUnoM ke prakAra
namUne ke prakAra kyA hEM Ora ve saMgrahAlaya ke lie iwane mahawvapUrNa kyoM hEM ?
moI BI SoXakarwwA akele kArya nahIM karawA hE waWA upalabXiyoM meM vyApaka rUpa se samuxAya ko SAmila kiyA jAwA hE .
vEjFAnika kEse jAnakArI xewe hEM ?
cma apane saMgrahoM waWA dAtA se kisa prakAra sUcanA wEyAra karawe hEM ?
apane viSleRaNa ke lie hama kisa prakAra kI wakanIka kA prayoga karawe hEM ?
SoXakarwwA apane aXyayana meM hamAre saMgrahoM , puswakAlayoM waWA viSeRajFawA kA kEse prayoga karawe hEM ?
prAkqwika viSva kI jAMca karane ke lie , upagraha se lekara sUkRmaxarSI waka , kaI Binna prakAra ke mAXyama hEM .
hama kina wakanIkoM kA prayoga karawe hEM ?
samakakRoM xvArA avalokiwa pawrikAeM , vijFAna kA pramuKa AXAra hEM .
unameM prakASiwa vEjFAnika leKoM kI viSvasanIyawA kI jAMca vEjFAnikoM ke anya samUhoM xvArA kI jAwI hE .
ye prAyaH OYnalAina para BI prakASiwa howe hEM .
sammelana eka anya mahawvapUrNa mAXyama hE .
' kArya vivaraNa ' ke rUpa meM OpacArika pepara prakASiwa howe hEM , kinwu anOpacArika saMcAra ke lie BI eka avasara howA hE .
mahawvapUrNa vicAra
pariyojanAeM sammelana meM kisI vyakwi kI Akasmika tippaNI ke pariNAmasvarUpa bahuwa sArI SoXa aswiwva meM AyI hEM .
janawA ke sAWa sUcanA kA AxAna-praxAna
pariSuxXawA suniSciwa karane ke lie SoXakarwwA anya saMvAhakoM ke sAWa kArya karawe hEM .
uxAharaNa ke lie , vEjFAnikoM xvArA praxarSanI ke lie sAmagrI wEyAra karane , vqwwaciwra wEyAra karane , pawrakAroM ke praSnoM ke uwwara xene waWA iMtaraneta para prakASiwa karane meM maxaxa karawe hEM .
SurUAwI pahala ke xvArA , jEse dArvina kenxra waWA GatanAeM , jEse rARtrIya vijFAna sapwAha meM SoXakarwwAoM xvArA janawA se sIXe vicAroM kA AxAna-praxAna karanA .
saMgrahAlaya ke vEjFAnikoM ke sAWa prawyakRa milana meM BAga lenA .
saMsAXana - namUne
orya sampanna karane ke lie saMgrahAlaya ke pAsa wIna pramuKa saMsAXana hEM : namUne , puswakAlaya waWA viSeRajFa SoXakarwwA .
hamAre puswakAlaya hamAre SoXa waWA saMgrahapAla ke lie nirNAyaka hEM .
isake sAWa-sAWa saMgawa AXunika kAryoM se yukwa varwamAna pawrikAeM mOjUxa hEM , jinameM viswqwa EwihAsika AleKa hEM .

namUnoM kA saMgrahaNa - BUmi

namUnoM kA saMgrahaNa - jala

EwihAsika saMgraha

mahAsaciva saxana kA wIsarA mahawZvapUrNa aXikArI mahAsaciva howA hE

1 paMWa ( Creed ) saMviXAna para saMviXAna saBA ke saxasyoM xvArA 24 janavarI , 1950 ko , saMviXAna saBA ke aMwima xina aMwima rUpa se haswAkRara kie gae .

isa saMGa kA prawyeka varRa sammelana howA hE Ora yaha prAxeSika swaroM para saMsaxIya praWA evaM prakriyA para vicAra goRTiyAM Ayojiwa karane meM BI sahAyaka howA hE .
BArawa jaba se aMwarsaMsaxIya saMGa Ora rARtramaMdala saMsaxIya saMGa kA saxasya banA hE waBI se ina saMsWAoM ke kAryakaraNa meM paryApwa ruci lewA rahA hE .
isake awirikwa , aneka aMwarrARtrIya prAxeSika vicAra goRTiyoM kA samaya samaya para BArawa meM Ayojana kiyA jAwA rahA hE .
siwaMbara , 1991 meM eka bAra Pira BArawa ne rARtramaMdala saMsaxIya sammelana kI Ora 1993 meM aMwarsaMsaxIya sammelana kI mejabAnI kI Ora nayI xillI meM ye sammelana viXivawa saMpanna hue .
BArawa kI saMviXAna saBA kI bETaka ( 1946-49 ) isI kakRa meM huI WI .
1947 meM aMgrejoM se BArawIyoM ke hAWoM meM sawwA kA eka EwihAsika haswAMwaraNa BI isI kakRa meM huA WA .

pahalI maMjila para cAra samiwi kakRoM kA prayoga saMsaxIya samiwiyoM kI bETakoM ke lie kiyA jAwA hE .
isI maMjila para wIna anya kakRoM kA prayoga saMvAxaxAwAoM xvArA kiyA jAwA hE jo loka saBA waWA rAjya saBA kI presa xIrGAoM meM Awe hEM .
badZI saMKyA meM puswakeM saMsaxa Bavana ke bAhara xUsarI imArawoM meM jamA karake raKI huI hEM .
saMsaxa Bavana kI xIvAroM para aneka mahAna vAkya uwkIrNa hEM jo saxanoM meM vicAra-vimarSa ke lie preraNA srowa hEM .
saMsaxa Bavana meM praveSa karawe hI , upaniRaxoM se saMskqwa meM eka sUkwi hameM rARtra kI praBuwA kA , jisakI xqSyamAna prawIka saMsaxa hE , smaraNa karAwI hE .

telIPona eksaceMja , telIkOYma byUro , dAkaGara Axi BI isI nimnawala meM hEM .

jalASaya isa kRewra kI pramuKa viSeRawA hE .
iMtara-kAma waWA bAharI kAloM ke lie eka hI telIPona kA prayoga kiyA jAwA hE .
xarSakoM ke lie BramaNa kI vyavasWA aXiveSanoM ke bIca kI avaXiyoM meM paryatakoM , CAwroM Ora qci raKane vAle aq_ya vyi>yoM ko nirxiRta samaya ke xaqrAna saMsaxa kI imAraweM xeKane ke lie GumAne kI vyavasWA vixyamAna hE .
xarSakoM ke sAWa stAPa kA eka saxasya jAwA hE jo unakA mArgaxarSana karawA hE waWA imArawoM ke bAre meM saMkRepa meM bawAwA hE .
CAwroM waWA saMsaxIya saMsWAoM ke kAryakaraNa ke bAre meM jAnakArI prApwa karane meM viSeRa rUpa se ruci raKane vAle anya logoM ke samUhoM ke lie viSeRa BramaNa kI vyavasWA BI kI jAwI hE .
EsI sWiwiyoM meM , saMsaxIya aXyayana waWA praSikRaNa keMxra BramaNa SurU karane se pahale xarSakoM ko saMkRipwa paricaya xene kI vyavasWA karawA hE .
piCale xasa varRoM ke xOrAna hara varRa saMsaxa Bavana kI imArawoM ko xeKane ke lie Ane vAle xarSakoM kI kula saMKyA 3000 se lagaBaga 90,000 ke bIca rahI hE .
kaI SoXa-pawroM meM sAibawa ikayA gayA hE ika eVspeVrAnwo sIKane se anya BARAoM kA sIKanA AsAna ho jAwA hE .
yaha BI anuSiMsawa ikayA gayA hE ika BARA-cewanA ke pATyakramoM kI biunayAxa meM hI eVspeVrAnwo simmilawa honA cAihae .
eVspeVrAnwo samuxAya una cune-igane ivaSvavyApI samuxAyoM meM se hE ijanakA hara saxasya xuBARI yA bahuBARI hE .
hama mAnawe hEM ika hara inasAna ko , cAhe vo CotI jZabAna bolane vAlA ho , yA badZI , eka xUsarI jZabAna ucca-swara waka sIKane kA mOkA imalanA cAihae .
BARA-aiXakAra
BARAoM kI wAkawoM kA asamAna ivawaraNa , xiunayA meM jZyAxAwara logoM meM BARA asurakSA pExA karawI hE , yA iPara yaha asamAnawA Kule Ama BARA awyAcAra kA rUpa lewI hE .
qspaqrAnwo samuxAya kA hara saxasya , cAhe vo wAkawavara jaqbAna kA bolane vAlA ho , yA balahIna , eka samAna swara para hara xUsare saxasya se imalawA hE , samaJaqwA karane ke ilae wayyAra howA hE .
magara qspaqrAnwo samuxAya BARA ko eka awyAvaRyaka Ora inaranwara Xana ke rUpa meM xeKawI hE .
isa kAraNa , hara BARA , hara prakAra ke jIva-janwu kI waraha , sahAyawA Ora surakSA ke lAyaka hE .
hama mAnawe hEM ika kevala jAwIya BARAoM para AXAirawa rahanA , saMpreRaNa , Ora saMGaTana kI svawaMwrawA meM avaSya hI bAXAez pExA karawI hE .
hamArA Anxolana mAnava banXanamiukwa kA Anxolana hE .

6 carcA prasZwAvaka xvArA yaha prasZwAva peSa kie jAne para AraMBa howI hE ? ki saBA aba upasZWiwa ho ? .
prasZwAva para prasZwAvaka Ora anZya saxasZyoM ke bola cukane ke paSZcAwa maMwrI bolawA hE Ora aMwa meM prasZwAvaka ko carcA kA uwwara xene kA aXikAra howA hE .
varRa 1953 se pahale EsI carcAeM uTAne ke lie koI upabaMXa nahIM WA .

isalie 1953 meM eka praWA ZbanI jisake anusAra saxasZya Ese mAmaloM para alZpakAlIna carcA uTA sakawe We .
EsI carcA uTAne ke lie mAmale kA saMkRepa meM ulZleKa karawe hue usake kAraNoM kI sZpaRZta vZyAKZyA karawe hue saxasZya xvArA mahAsaciva ko sUcanA xenI howI hE .
EsI sUcanA para saMsaxa ke kama se kama xo anZya saxasZyoM ke hasZwAkRara BI hone cAhie .
prasZwAva peSa karane vAlA saxasZya prasZwAva ko EsA rUpa xewA hE jisa rUpa meM vaha cAhawA ho ki saxana use sZvIkqwa kare .
sAmAnZyawayA , sarakAra ke prasZwAva kisI nIwi yA kAryavAhI ke lie saxana kA anumoxana prApZwa karane saMbaMXI prasZwAva howe hEM .
xUsarI ora , gEra-sarakArI saxasZyoM xvArA peSa kie jAne vAle prasZwAvoM kA uxxeSZya sAmAnZyawayA kisI mAmale para sarakAra kI rAya yA vicAra jAnanA howA hE .

( ka ) gEra-sarakArI saxasZyoM ke saMkalZpa : gEra-sarakArI saxasZyoM xvArA peSa kie jAne vAle saMkalZpoM ko gEra-sarakArI saxasZyoM ke saMkalZpa kahA jAwA hE .
vAsZwava meM inase Ese prasZwAvoM ke bAre meM jo aBI aniSZciwa hoM yA jinake bAre meM janamawa aBI bananA ho , saxana ke vicAra jAnane kA sarakAra ko avasara milawA hE .
jo saxasZya saMkalZpa peSa karanA cAhawA ho use apanI isa icZCA kI sUcanA mahAsaciva ko xenI howI hE .
sarakAra xvArA paxawyAga karane ke praSna para koI niSciwa niyama nahIM hE .
aviSvAsa praswAva maMwripariRaxa jaba waka paxAsIna rahawI hE waba waka use loka saBA kA viSvAsa prApwa rahawA hE .
isa viSvAsa kA pawA lagAne ke lie , niyamoM meM isa ASaya kA eka praswAva peSa karane kA upabaMXa hE jise ? aviSvAsa praswAva ? kahA jAwA hE .
kisI maMwrI xvArA apane viBAga meM koI kArya kie jAne yA kArya na kie jAne ke lie saMsaxa ke prawi usake vyakwigawa uwwaraxAyiwva ke bAre meM saMviXAna meM koI spaRta upabaMXa nahIM hE .
yaha uwwaraxAyiwva sAmUhiwa howA hE .
37 kisI niMxA praswAva ke asamAna , aviSvAsa praswAva meM ve kAraNa bawAne AvaSyaka nahIM hE .
anyaWA yaha samaJA jAwA hE ki saxasya ko saxana kI anumawi prApwa nahIM huI .
aviSvAsa kA praswAva jaba eka bAra gqhIwa ho jAwA hE wo anumawi xie jAne ke xina se xasa xina ke BIwara use bahasa ke lie liyA jAnA howA hE .
sarakAra ke vicAra jAnane ke bAxa , aXyakRa PEsalA karawA hE ki praswAva para carcA kisI xina ho .
yaxi sarakAra EsA cAhe wo carcA usI samaya AraMBa kI jA sakawI hE .
carcA ke lie samaya sAmAnyawayA kArya maMwraNA samiwi kI siPAriSa para nirXAriwa kiyA jAwA hE .

praswAvaka ko carcA kA uwwara xene kA aXikAra howA hE .
isa bayAna meM sammiliwa yojanA ke aMwargawa xeSa ke viBAjana kI anivAryawAko svIkAra kiyA gayA WA .
isa bayAna ke anusAra varwamAna saMviXAna saBA xvArA banAe gae saMviXAna ko anicCuka kRewroM para WopA nahIM jA sakawA WA .
isa samUcI yojanA kA vAswavika pariNAma waWA praBAva yahI honA WA ki BArawa kA viBAjana BArawa waWA pAkiswAna ke rUpa meM kara xiyA jAe .
BArawIya svawaMwrawA ekta ke anusAra , 14-15 agaswa ko BArawa waWA pAkiswAna kI xo dominiyamoM kA gaTana ho gayA .
saMviXAna kA nirmANa saMviXAna saBA kisI praBuwA saMpanna lokawAMwrika rARtra kI saMviXAna-racanA kA kArya sAmAnyawayA usakI janawA ke prawiniXi-nikAya xvArA kiyA jAwA hE .
bajata peSa karawe hue bajata BARaNa xiyA jAwA hE jo vAswava meM saMsaxa meM sabase mahawvapUrNa BARaNoM meM se eka howA hE .
loka saBA meM viwwa maMwrI kA BARaNa samApwa hone para , bajata kI eka prawi rAjya saBA ke patala para raKI jAwI hE .
usake wuraMwa paScAwa maMwrI viXeyaka peSa karawA hE jisameM sarakAra ke karAXAna praswAva howe hEM .
( ka ) bajata para carcA : saMsaxa mUlawayA vicAra vimarSa karane vAlA nikAya hE .
bajata pAsa karane kI prakriyA meM saMsaxa ke xonoM saxanoM meM gaMBIra evaM pUrNa carcA howI hE .
bajata para carcA bajata peSa kiye jAne ke kuCa xina paScAwa AraMBa howI hE .
isase saxasyoM ko bajata ke pATa kA pUrI waraha aXyayana karane Ora viwwIya praswAvoM para Apasa meM vicAra karane ke lie AvaSyaka samaya mila jAwA hE .
bajata para xo avasWAoM meM carcA kI jAwI hE arWAw " sAmAnya carcA " Ora usake bAxa viswAra meM " anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM para carcA Ora mawaxAna " .
isake alAvA , viwwIya praswAvoM para agrewaracarcA kA avasara viniyoga viXeyaka Ora viwwa viXeyaka para vicAra kie jAne Ora inheM pAsa kie jAne ke xOrAna milawA hE .
( eka ) sAmAnya carcA : bajata para carcA sAmAnya vAxa vivAxa se AraMBa howI hE , jo saMsaxa ke xonoM saxanoM meM wIna yA cAra xina waka calawA hE .
isa prakAra sAmAnya vAxa vivAxa se prawyeka saxana ko apane vicAra vyakwa karane kA avasara milawA hE .
waba sarakAra ko BI ABAsa ho jAwA hE ki kisI praswAva viSeRa ke prawi bAxa kI avasWAoM meM kyA prakriyA hogI .
yaha XyAna xene kI bAwa hE ki rAjya saBA kI xI gaI Sakwi ke anusAra use sAmAnya carcA ke alAvA bajata se koI sarokAra nahIM howA .
( xo ) anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM para carcA : prakriyA ke anusAra xUsarI avasWA meM anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM para carcA Ora mawaxAna kI hE .
sAmAnyawayA , prawyeka maMwrAlaya ke lie praswAviwa anuxAnoM ke lie alaga mAMgeM raKI jAwI hEM .
mAMgoM para carcA rucipUrNa howI hE Ora isa carcA ke xOrAna maMwrAlaya kI nIwiyoM Ora kAryakaraNa kI bArIkI se CAnabIna kI jAwI hE .
prawyeka maMwrAlaya kI mAMgoM para carcA ke lie alaga se samaya niyawa kiyA jAwA hE .
anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM ke mUla praswAva ke sahAyaka praswAva peSa karake saxasya EsA kara sakawe hEM .
ina sahAyaka praswAvoM ko saMsaxIya BARA meM " katOwI praswAva " kahA jAwA hE .
kArya maMwraNA samiwi kisI mAMga viSeRa ko Ora bajata sahiwa anuxAnoM kI saba mAMgoM ko svIkqwa karane ke lie samaya para sImA nirXAriwa karawI hE .
jEse hI kisI mAMga kI samaya sImA samApwa howI hE , usa carcA ke " samApana " kI prakriyA lAgU kI jAwI hE Ora mAMga ko mawaxAna ke lie raKa xiyA jAwA hE .
isa prakriyA ko " gilotina " kahawe hEM .
isake sAWa hI anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM para carcA samApwa ho jAwI hE .
1994 ke bajata aXiveSana ke xOrAna ina samiwiyoM ne varRa 1994-95 kI anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM para 48 riporteM peSa kIM .
( ga ) viniyoga viXeyaka ( eproprieSana bila ) : saMviXAna ke anusAra , BArawa kI saMciwa niXi meM se koI Xana , saMsaxa xvArA viXi ke aXiniyama ke binA , nahIM nikAlA jA sakawA .
isa viXeyaka kA ASaya , jEsA ki isake nAma se spaRta hE , saMciwa niXi meM se vyaya ke viniyoga ke lie sarakAra ko kAnUnI aXikAra xenA hE .
viXeyYaka ke loka saBA xvArA pAsa kie jAne ke paScAwa aXyakRa pramANiwa karawA hE ki vaha eka Xana viXeyaka hE Ora use rAjya saBA ke pAsa BejA jAwA hE .
rAjya saBA ko viXeyaka meM saMSoXana karane yA use asvIkqwa karane kI Sakwi prApwa nahIM hE Ora use viXeyaka para apanI sammawi praxAna karanI hI padZawI hE .
isake paScAw viXeyaka rARtrapawi kI anumawi ke lie usake samakRa praswuwa kiyA jAwA hE .
viXeyaka para carcA sAmAnya praSAsana Ora sWAnIya SikAyawoM saMbaMXI Ese mAmaloM para howI hEM qnake lie saMGa sarakAra u<@ardayaI @haotI @hO .

saMkRepa meM , samUce praSAsana kA punarIkRaNa wo howA hE paraMwu jina praSnoM para carcA ho cukI ho una para Pira se carcA nahIM kI jA sakawI .
yaha viXeyaka peSa kie jAne ke paScAwa 75 xinoM ke BIwara saMsaxa xvArA isa para vicAra karake pAsa kiyA jAnA Ora usa para rARtrapawi kI anumawi prApwa ho jAnA AvaSyaka hE .
leKAnuxAna hyavona Ana ekAuMtahq lokawAMwrika vyavasWA meM sarakAra bajata ke upabaMXoM Ora kara praswAvoM para carcA karane kA saMsaxa ko pUrA avasara xene kA prayAsa karawI hE .
jaba waka saMsaxa mAMgeM svIkqwa nahIM kara lewI waba waka ke lie yaha AvaSyaka hE ki xeSa kA praSAsana calAne ke lie sarakAra ke pAsa paryApwa Xana upalabXa ho .
praWA ke anusAra , leKAnuxAna ko eka OpacArikawA mAnA jAwA hE Ora loka saBA binA carcA ke isa pAsa kara xewI hE .
leKAnuxAna waba pAsa howA hE jaba bajata para sAmAnya carcA ho cukI ho Ora anuxAnoM kI mAMgoM para carcA aBI AraMBa honI ho .
rela bajata ke mAmale meM jo 31 mArca se pahale pAsa kara xiyA jAwA hE , leKAnuxAna nahIM liyA jAwA lekina AvaSyaka ho wo nirvAcana varRa meM liyA jA sakawA hE .
anupUraka waWA awiri> anuxAnoM kI mAMgeM saMsaxa xvArA prAXiqwa rASiyoM se aXika rASi usakI maMjUrI ke binA Karca nahIM kI jA sakawI .
Ese awirikwa vyaya ke saBI mAmale niyaMwraka mahAleKAparIkRaka xvArA viniyoga leKAoM para apane prawivexana ke mAXyama se saMsaxa kI jAnakArI meM lAe jAwe hEM .
waba awirikwa vyaya ke mAmaloM kI jAMca loka leKA samiwi xvArA kI jAwI hE jo saxana ke samakRa peSa kie jAne vAle apane prawivexana meM usa vyaya ko niyamiwa karane ke bAre meM siPAriSeM peSa karawI hE .
yaxi anya maMwrAlaya yA rAjya sarakAreM BI usa se saMbaMXiwa hoM wo unakA parAmarSa liyA jAwA hE .
vyAvasAyikoM Ora viBinna hiwoM vAle grupoM , jEse vyApAriyoM , SramikoM , kqRakoM Ora uxyogapawiyoM kA BI , yaxi EsA AvaSyaka samaJA jAe wo , parAmarSa liyA jAwA hE .
usake bAxa viXeyaka kI praSAsanika maMwrAlaya xvArA saBI saMbaMXiwa prAXikAriyoM ke parAmarSa se viswqwa rUpa se jAMca kI jAwI hE Ora use aMwima rUpa xiyA jAwA hE .
isa samUcI prakriyA ke paScAwa viXeyaka saxana ke samakRa lAe jAne ke lie wEyAra ho jAwa hE .
saMbaMXiwa maMwrI xvArA use saMsaxa ke xonoM saxanoM meM se kisI BI saxana meM peSa kiyA jA sakawA hE .
sAXAraNawayA , viXeyaka kI prawiyAM usa wiWi se kama se kama xo xina pUrva jabaki viXeyaka peSa karane kA vicAra ho , saxasyoM ko upalabXa ho jAnI cAhiye .
( xo ) wIna vAcana : aXiniyama kA rUpa lene se pUrva viXeyaka ko saMsaxa meM viBinna avasWAoM se gujaranA padZawA hE .

( ka ) praWama vAcana : kisI BI viXeyaka ko peSa karane ke lie saxana kI anumawi lenA AvaSyaka hE .
maMwrI Pira KadZA hokara yaha kahawA hE , ? mahoxaya mEM . . .. . .. . .. . .. . .. . .. . .. . .. viXeyaka peSa karawA hUM . ?
usake paScAwa praSna saxana ke mawaxAna ke lie raKA jAwA hE .

ye waxarWa samiwiyAM howI hEM jo nirxiRta kie jAne vAle viSeRa viXeyakoM para vicAra karane ke lie niyukwa kI jAwI hEM .

samiwi viSeRajFoM kA , Ese saMGoM kA yA sarakArI nikAyoM kA sAkRya BI le sakawI hE jo usa viXAna meM ruci raKawe hoM .
samiwiyoM meM viXeyaka para vicAra karane kI prakriyA vahI hE jo saxana meM howI hE .
rAya prApwa ho jAne para unheM saxana ke saBA patala para raKa xiyA jAwA hE jisake paScAwa viXeyaka ko pravara/saMyukwa samiwi ko nirxiRta karane kA praswAva peSa kiyA jAwA hE .
sAXAraNawayA isakI anumawi nahIM hE ki isa avasWA meM viXeyaka para vicAra karane kA praswAva peSa kiyA jAe .
yaxi rARtrapawi anumawi praxAna kara xewA hE wo anumawi kI wiWi se viXeyaka aXiniyama bana jAwA hE .
apanI anumawi xene se iMkAra karane yA anumawi praxAna kara xene ke bajAya rARtrapawi viXeyaka ko isa saMxeSa ke sAWa vApisa kara sakawA hE ki xonoM saxana usa para punaH vicAra kareM .
yaha yAxa raKane kI bAwa hE ki yaxi EsA praSna uwpanna ho jAe ki koI viXeyaka Xana viXeyaka hE aWavA nahIM wo isa bAre meM aXyakRa kA PEsalA aMwima hogA .

vaha rARtrapawi kI siPAriSa para kevala loka saBA meM hI peSa kiyA jA sakawA hE .
saMsaxa Ese saMkalpa kA anumoxana kara sakawI hE yA niranumoxana kara sakawI hE yA yaxi cAhe usa para koI kAryavAhI na kare .
gEra-sarakArI saxasyoM xvArA lAe jAne vAle viXeyakoM para carcA karane se saxana ko samasyAoM ko samaJane kA Ora unake saBI pahaluoM para vicAra karane kA avasara milawA hE .
gEra-sarakArI saxasya kA viXeyaka aMwa me pAsa ho yA na ho paraMwu usa para carcA karane se saxana ke saBI prakAra ke mawoM se sarakAra avagawa ho jAwI hE .

sarakAra viXeyaka ke viRaya ke bAre meM nIwi viRayaka PEsalA karawI hE Ora apane vicAra saxana ke samakRa raKawI hE .
loka saBA ke niyamoM ke aXIna EsI prawyeka samiwi kevala isI kAraNa saMsaxIya samiwi nahIM howI ki vaha saMsaxa ke saxasyoM se banI hE .
isa prakAra , ve saMsaxIya samiwiyAM nahIM howIM .
viBinna prakAra kI samiwiyAM BArawa meM xo prakAra kI saMsaxIya samiwiyAM hEM , arWAwa ( eka ) sWAyI samiwiyAM Ora ( xo ) waxarWa
sWAyI samiwiyAM : prawyeka saxana meM sWAyI samiwiyAM ( Ora kuCa saMyukwa samiwiyAM ) unake kqwyoM ke anusAra isa prakAra SreNIbaxXa kI jA sakawI hEM :
unakI siPAriSoM kA uxxeSya ina nIwiyoM Ora kAryakramoM ko miwavyayawA se , kuSalawA se Ora SIGrawA se kArya rUpa xene ke lie praSAsana ko saxA sawarka banAe raKawA hE .
ina samiwiyoM ke prawivexanoM ke kAraNa inheM samAja ke sarakArI Ora gEra sarakArI saBI vargoM se paryApwa sammAna milA hE .
ina samiwiyoM xvArA kI gaI siPAriSoM kI anuvarwI kAryavAhI kI viswqwa evaM praBAvI prakriyA anyawra vixyamAna saMsaxIya prakriyAoM ko mUla rUpa se BArawIya xena hE .
wInoM viwwIya samiwiyAM eka xUsare ke lie saxana xvArA nirvAciwa kI jAwI hEM .
maMwrIgaNa na wo ina samiwiyoM ke saxasya bana sakawe hEM Ora na hI unheM sAkRya xene ke lie inake samakRa upasWiwa hone ke lie kahA jA sakawA hE .
inake saBApawi aXyakRa xvArA manonIwa kie jAwe hEM .
isa aXikAra kA prayoga yAcikA samiwi ke mAXyama se kiyA jAwA hE .
prawyeka saxana kI eka yAcikA samiwi hE .
loka saBA meM isa samiwi ke 15 saxasya hEM Ora rAjya saBA meM 10 saxasya .
yAcikA samiwi kA kqwya EsI prawyeka yAcikA kI jAMca karanA hE jo saxana meM peSa kie jAne ke paScAwa samiwi ko nirxiRta ho jAwI hE .
samiwi EsA sAkRya lene ke uparAMwa , jo vaha uciwa samaJe , yAcikA meM kI gaI viSiRta SikAyawoM para saxana meM prawivexana peSa karawI hE .

SrI araviMxa ( 1872-1950 ) SrI araviMxa ( araviMxa GoRa ) kA janma 15 agaswa , 1872 ko kalakawwA meM
unake piwA kqRNAXana GoRa ( 1845-1893 ) paScima baMgAla ke suprawiRTiwa GoRa parivAra se saMbaMXa raKawe We .

kEMbrija viSvavixyAlaya kI iMdiyana majalisa ke saciva ke rUpa meM unhoMne kaI krAMwikArI BARaNa xie jinameM sEnya vixroha ko BArawa kI svAXInawA kA ekamAwra rAswA bawAyA .

unhoMne saMskqwa , marATI , gujarAwI Ora bolacAla kI bAMglA sIKI , mahAkAvyoM , upaniRaxoM Ora saMskqwa sAhiwya kA jFAna prApwa kiyA Ora aMgrejI meM kaviwA , nAtaka Ora nibaMXa liKe .
vaha nae-nae bane neSanala kAleja ( aba jAxavapura viSvavixyAlaya ) ke praXAnAcArya banakara kalakawwA cale Aye .

maI 1908 meM 38 anya krAMwikAriyoM ke sAWa unheM BI giraPwAra kiyA gayA jahAM unhoMne rihAI se pahale ' aMdaratrAyala ' ke rUpa meM eka sAla biwAya .
ParavarI 1910 kI eka SAma unheM yaha sUcanA milI ki agale xina unake xaPwara kI walASI lI jAyegI Ora unheM giraPwAra kiyA jAyegA .

san 1926 meM araviMxa ekAMwavAsa meM cale gaye , jisameM vaha 1950 meM apanI mqwyu waka rahe .
SrI araviMxa GoRa Ora anya sAWiyoM kA mukaxamA hya1908-1909hq alIpura bamakAMda EwihAsika mahawva ke rArjyamukaxamoM meM se eka hE , kyoMki vaha Ese samaya meM huA WA , jaba baMgAla meM asaMwoRa apanI parAkARTA para WA .
yaha mukaxamA una susaMskqwa , SikRiwa Ora prabuxXa logoM se saMbaMXiwa WA , jo samAja ke aBijAwa varga se Awe We .
cAkI ne apanI rivAlvara nikAlakara kara Kuxa ko golI mAra lI .
saxame Ora AwaMka kI eka lahara jEse pUre xeSa meM xOdZa gayI .
unake vakwavya ke kuCa aMSa yahAM praswuwa hE :
apane xoswoM abinASa BattAcArya ( jo giraPwAra kie gaye hEM ) Ora BUpenxranAWa xawwa ( jo jela meM hEM ) ke sAWa milakara mEMne ' jugAMwara ' pawra nikAlanA SurU kiyA .

hama hameSA Ane vAlI krAMwi kA svapna xeKawe We Ora usake lie wEyAra rahanA cAhawe We , isalie hama XIre-XIre haWiyAra ikatTe kara rahe We .
kula milAkara mEMne gyAraha rivAlvara , cAra rAiPaleM Ora eka baMxUka ekawra kI hE .
hamAre xala meM SAmila hone vAle anya vyakwiyoM meM ullAsakara xawwa BI WA.muJe TIka-TIka yAxa nahIM , lekina yaha isa sAla kI SurUAwa kI bAwa hE .

ina waWyoM ko ujAgara karane kI upayukwawA ko lekara hamAre xala meM mawaBexa WA .

waxuparAMwa mEjistreta ne aBiyukwoM ko xo xaloM meM bAMtakara una para aBiyoga lagAye .

" Ora mEM , isake xvArA , yahAM AxeSa xewA hUM ki wuma para ukwa aBiyogoM ke wahawa ukwa korta xvArA mukaxamA calAyA jAye . "

" mEM , isake xvArA wuma para ye aBiyoga lagAwA hUM :

waBI Ora kevala waBI Apa ISvara kA qNa lOtA sakawe hEM .

" mEM apane virUxXa lagAe gaye AropoM meM nirxoRa hUM .

" vinAyaka xAmoxara sAparakara , yaha axAlawa wumheM AjIvana nirvAsana kA xaMda Ora wumhArI sArI saMpawwi jabwa karane kA AxeSa xewI hE . "
ye nirNaya ekapakRIya Ora niraMkuSa We Ora aBiyoga pakRa ke anajAMce pramANoM para aXAriwa We .
PrAMsisI BUmi para unakI giraPwArI kI vEXawA tribyayUnala ke lie koI mahawva nahIM raKawI WI .

ye SarweM WI :

" mere sArvajanika jIvana kA AraMBa xakRiNa aPrIkA meM 1893 kI saMkatakAlIna parisZWiwiyoM meM huA .

yaha EwihAsika mukaxamA sADZe cAra sAla waka calA Ora xeSa Bara ke kamZyunisZta Ora treda yUniyana AMxolanoM kA lagaBaga sArA newqwZva isase judZa gayA WA .
meraTa RadyaMwra kAMda ne , prawiRZTiwa vZyavasZWA ke rAjanIwika Ora ArWika praBuwZva ko cunOwI xene vAle saMgaTiwa viroXa yA asaMwoRa ke KilAPa , britiSa sAmrAjZyavAxa kA asalI ceharA ujAgara kiyA WA .
san 1928-1929 kA xOra BArawIya iwihAsa meM awZyaMwa mahawZvapUrNa hE kZyoMki vaha eka saMgaTiwa vAmapaMWI AMxolana kA ( saBI ArWika Ora rAjanIwika avayavoM sahiwa ) AraMBa WA .
treda-yUniyanoM kI sZWApanA ne majaxUroM ko apanI SikAyawoM ko sAmane raKane Ora acZCe vewana waWA behawara kArya-sZWiwi ke lie ladZane yogZya banA xiyA WA .

yahAM waka ki kuCa britiSa nAgarika BI isa AMxolana meM apanA sakriya yogaxAna xe rahe We .
jalZxI hI , aMgreja sarakAra isa Kaware ke prawi sawarka ho gayI WI Ora asane isa AMxolana ko AraMBa meM hI kucala xene ke lie aneka vEXAnika Ora praSAsanika kaxama uTAye We .
BArawa sarakAra isa saMbaMXa meM iMgZlEMda kI britiSa sarakAra se lagAwAra saMparka banAe hue WI Ora unase vEXAnika Ora xaMdAwZmaka yukZwiyAM apanAne ke barAbara nirxeSa lie jA rahe We .

vaha xeSa meM asaMwoRa kA xOra WA , jaba janasaMKZyA kA eka badZA hisZsA aMgrejoM ke rAjanIwika xamana Ora ArWika SoRaNa se mukZwi kI mAMga kara rahA WA .

awaH BArawa meM saMvEXAnika sarakAra kI sZWApanA kA ekamAwra rAsZwA yahI hE ki usa britiSa samrAta ke KilAPa krAMwikArI ladZAI CedZI jAye , jisane BArawa kI sawwA hadZapa lI hE .

cAhe koI BI plEtaPOYrma ho ,
cAhe koI BI progrAma ho ,
cAhe koI BI BARA ho .

yaha niwAMwa eka mUrKawA hE ki hama pragawi ke nAma para apane vanoM ko naRta kara rahe hEM Ora apane pArisWiwika saMwulana ko bigAdZa rahe hEM .
vyApaka swara kI xUragAmI yojanAoM ke aBAva meM SaharIkaraNa ne aneka SaharI waWA upaSaharI kRewroM ko vyavasAyika jaMgaloM meM baxala xiyA hE .
SaharoM kI vqxXi , kqRi ke prasAra , bAMXoM ke nirmANa waWA vanoM ke vinASa se jaMgalI jIvoM ke AvAsa naRta hue hEM .
jIvoM kI bahuwa-sI prajAwiyoM Ora upaprajAwiyoM ke vilupwa hone kA KawarA uwpanna ho gayA hE .
jaMgalI jIvoM ke AvAsoM ko naRta karane ke awirikwa hama jAnavaroM Ora unake Bojana ko , pIdZakanASiyoM , Kara-pawavAranASiyoM waWA xUsare rasAyanoM se viRAkwa kara rahe hEM .
ye rasAyana maCaliyoM , pakRiyoM Ora lABaxAyaka kItoM ko mAra rahe hEM .
unakA apanA praSasZwa vZyakwiwZva Ora BavZya cAla-DAla waWA prAcIna AraNZyaka qRiyoM ke AxarSo kA anavarawa rAga alApawe rahane ke kAraNa BI-unake sarjaka vZyakwiwZva ke bAre meM isa prakAra kI ekapakRIya XAraNA ko puRZta karane meM sahAyawA milI .
ejZarA pAuMda ne , jinZhoMne kavi ke xonoM rUpa xeKe We-unakI BAva prawimA ko TIka se samaJane kI koSiSa kI WI-lekina unakI AvAja akelI padZa gaI .
unZheM jahAM samZmAna milA WA , vahIM unakA sZvAsZWZya pahale se behawara ho gayA WA .
Ora sZvayaM kavi ko kEsA mahasUsa ho rahA WA ?
unakA EsA anuBava karanA mAnavociwa hI WA .
pAMca xinoM ke bAxa ravInxranAWa ne roWenstAina ko pawra liKA : ? yahAM logoM meM unmAxapUrNa uwwejanA kA jEsA bavaMdara hE , usase mEM sacamuca pareSAna ho gayA hUM .
yaha lagaBaga vEsA hI hE jEse ki kisI kuwwe kI pUMCa meM eka KAlI dibbA bAMXa xiyA jAe Ora binA koI Sora macAe yA BIdZa ikatTA kie use BAgane ko kahA jAe .
apane xo tUka Ora kAvyAwmaka SabxoM meM kavi ne unako bawAyA ki ve isa sammAna ko svIkAra nahIM kara sakawe kyoMki yaha saba eka waraha kA Caxma hEM .
cayana-samiwi ke xaswAvejoM se pawA calawA hE ki svIdiSa akAxamI ke lie yaha praswAva hErAnI BarA WA .
eka waraha se , niwAMwa XArmika kAvya se kisI ArWika puraskAra ko jodZanA isakI prakqwi ke viruxXa hE .
yaha lagaBaga vEsA hI hE jEsA ki devida ke Bajana-gAna ( devida ke sAma ) yA seMta PrAMsisa ke gIwoM ke lie unheM rASi praxAna kI jAe .
lekina mere kahane kA wAwparya yaha nahIM hE ki unake Agamana se eka nae sAhiwyika yuga kI SuruAwa huI hE- jo ki unakI BARA ke iwihAsa meM sarvowwama hE .
aba ve sAre viSva ke lie uwane hI We , jiwane ki BArawa ke lie .
Ora ravInxranAWa kA BI EsA mAnanA WA- isalie nahIM ki ve viSvaprasixXa ho gae We balki isalie ki sAre saMsAra ke bAre meM vaha EsA hI mahasUsa karawe We .
hAlAMki Ese kaI viSva-prasixXa loga BI rahe hEM jo sArI xuniyA ke lie aniRta kara rahe hEM Ora Ese BI hEM- jinheM apanI nAka ke Age kuCa nahIM sUJawA .
yaha vESvika-cewanA jisakI jadZeM unake mana meM gaharAI se pETI WIM- apane hI xeSa ke kuCa logoM ke mana meM BrAMwa XAraNA kA SikAra BI huIM .
unake prawi hamAre mana meM jo sneha Ora sammAna WA- Ora jo sammiliwa uwsAha WA- vaha pahalI bAra isa wIvrawA meM PUta padZA WA ki usane apanI samujjavala ABA se hamArI samaswa sawwA ko raMga dAlA WA .
hamArA aMwara-AkASa waba Ora BI saweja ho uTawA WA- jaba hama unake bAre meM bAweM karawe yA Apasa meM vicAra-vimarSa kara rahe howe We .
hama xonoM ke mAmale meM TIka EsA hI waba huA jaba hamane kinhIM suKaxa kRaNoM meM mahAwmA gAMXI ke sAWa apanI nayI miwrawA kA saMXAna pA liyA .
xonoM hI snehAnurAga badZe hI aMwaraMga DaMga se Gula-mila gae .
ve hamAre jIvana ke sunahale kRaNa We Ora mahAwmA gAMXI ne pUrI sahAnuBUwi se guruxeva ke prawi hamArI niRTA ko samaJA WA .
ve bahuXA unase milane kI wIvra icCA ke bAre meM BI hameM bawAyA karawe .
Ora isa waraha hama saba eka sneha-vqwwa meM paraspara judZa gae We .
sana 1913 kI samApwi isa rUpa meM ulleKanIya rahI ki kalakawwA viSvavixyAlaya ne 26 xisaMbara ko eka viSeRa xIkRAMwa samAroha meM ravInxranAWa ko dAktareta kI mAnaxa upAXi se alaMkqwa kiyA .

isa sAla ke AraMBa meM , yUnAiteda stetsa meM liKI gaI unakI eka kaviwA isa arWa meM viSeRa ulleKanIya WI ki isameM KarIxane Ora becane kA eka rUpaka bahuwa praBAvI DaMga se viniyojiwa huA WA .

inameM prayukwa Sabxa , laya Ora prawIka iwane sahaja Ora svawa : PUrwa hEM ki EsA jAna padZawA hE ki ve kahIM bAhara se nahIM Ae balki yahAM upasWiwa hEM .

inameM hI eka kahAnI hE ? boRtamI ? ( vERNavI ) - jisameM eka mahIlA ne isalie apanA Gara-bAra CodZa xiyA hE wAki vaha paramAwmA kI pUjA-arcanA kara sake .
unhoMne isameM kisI kA pakRa nahIM liyA .
unameM AKira EsA kyA hE jo samApwa ho jAegA , mara jAegA yA Pira uTa KadZA hogA-- yaha Kuxa unheM pawA nahIM .
basa unheM iwanA hI jFAwa hE ki unheM Age calawe rahanA hE , usa nae rUpa meM DalanA hE Ora agara jarUrawa padZe wo- unheM apanI waraPa mudZe binA Age baDZa jAnA hE .
ye sArI kaviwAeM 1916 meM eka pawalI-sI kaviwA-puswikA ? balAkA ? ( haMsa kA udZAna ) meM prakASiwa huI .
yaha puswikA apane yuvA aMgreja miwra pIyarsana ko samarpiwa WI , Ora una SiKarasWa smqwiyoM se Xanya WI , jahAM samaya samaya para apanI himAlaya yAwrA ke xOrAna ve jAyA karawe We .
ravInxranAWa ko avaSya hI usakI koI wasvIra mila gaI hogI , kyoMki yaha kaviwA usI ko saMboXiwa hE .
yaha nAtaka SAMwinikewana Ora kalakawwA xonoM hI sWAnoM para aBinIwa huA.isameM ravInxranAWa ne kavi Ora aMXe bAula ( GumakkadZa sAXaka gAyaka ) - xonoM hI xoharI BUmikA niBAI WI .
